name: Jumping Dust
description:
Jumping Dust is a game based on the famous platform game "Jump King", but more difficult with a system of lives that can return you to the beginning of the level if you miscalculate the jump. If you like these types of games, you will find it fun and addictive, I wait your feedback in the survey that is in the pause menu.

This is my fisrt game, enjoy and dont break you computer if you can :)
